title: Group hypnosis with Mesmerism & Fascination 2 / Non-verbal hypnosis masterclass by Dr. Marco Paret
description:
This is the second part of the previous video: https://youtu.be/VpnHe8XdFNk  Dr. Marco Paret hypnotized four of his students in a group hypnosis, using these techniques. They entered in deep hypnotic states of hypnotic induction, somnambulism & catalepsy. In this video, we will see how they wake up from this non-verbal hypnotic experience, that liberated them. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
